des:
Mapeheat Thermo Connect WiFi-enabled, floor-sensing thermostat has been designed specifically for today’s smart home. Homeowners can monitor, control and program their Mapeheat Thermo Connect floor-heating system via a free smartphone app (iOS and Android) or any web browser. Now integrated with Amazon Alexa for even more possibilities.

To get started, select the 'Enable Skill' button to link your Mapeheat account and discover your thermostats. After connecting Alexa to your Mapeheat Thermo Connect thermostat you can use commands like:
- "Alexa, set the bathroom temperature to 27"
- "Alexa, increase the basement temperature by 5 degrees"
- "Alexa, decrease the bathroom temperature"
- "Alexa, what is the temperature of the bathroom?"
- "Alexa, what is the kitchen set to?"
- "Alexa, set the bathroom to heat mode"
